import React, { useState } from 'react' import ReactFileBase64 from 'react-file-base64' import { Button, Form } from 'react-bootstrap' import * as api from '../axios/index.js' const SubmitMemory = () => { const [memoryData, setMemoryData] = useState({ title: '', content: '', creator: '', image: '', }) return (<>
{ e.preventDefault() api.createMemory(memoryData) } } >

Create a Memory

 Title setMemoryData({ ...memoryData, title: e.target.value }) } > Content setMemoryData({ ...memoryData, content: e.target.value }) } > Author setMemoryData({ ...memoryData, creator: e.target.value }) } > setMemoryData({ ...memoryData, image: base64 }) } />
) } export default SubmitMemory
